mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWER VALUES( ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{abNo}, #{anWriter}, #{anContent}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT a.AN_NO AS anNo, a.ab_no as abNo, a.an_writer as anWriter, a.an_Content as anContent, a.filename as fileName, a.filepath as filePath, a.enroll_date as enrollDate, a.an_status as anStatus, b.member_nick as memberNick, b.filepath as pic FROM ANSWER a,member b WHERE a.an_writer = b.member_nick and a.AB_NO=#{abNo}
